parse: Conjunction
str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Article - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Noun - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: From alethes; truth.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From sun and phero; to bear together, i.e. to collect, or to conduce; especially advantage.

parse: Conjunction
str2: In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: From apo and erchomai; to go off, aside or behind, literally or figuratively.

parse: Conjunction
str2: If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: From apo and erchomai; to go off, aside or behind, literally or figuratively.

parse: Article - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Noun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) an advocate, intercessor, (b) a consoler, comforter, helper, (c) Paraclete. An intercessor, consoler.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To come, go.

parse: Preposition
str2: To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Conjunction
str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Conjunction
str2: If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: To travel, journey, go, die.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To send, transmit, permit to go, put forth.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Preposition
str2: To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
